Uses of Class
nl.inl.blacklab.search.Hit

  • Packages that use Hit 
    Package Description
    nl.inl.blacklab.perdocument
    Classes for dealing with per-document resultsets (instead of per-hits resultsets, which BlackLab mostly deals with)
    nl.inl.blacklab.search
    Contains the main BlackLab classes.
    nl.inl.blacklab.search.grouping
    Classes for grouping hits.
    nl.inl.blacklab.search.lucene
    Our own extensions to Lucene, used by BlackLab.
    nl.inl.blacklab.search.sequences
    Classes dealing with regex-like patterns of token-level queries, like required for CorpusQL.

      Add a hit to the list of hits.
